body:
Hi. I feel like I should introduce myself as I'm probably that one ref no one knows or has ever heard of. So to a little bit about me, I tend to go by Crazy, I got ref in the last batch, and I moderate on OCN. I'm hoping on getting more into the network, as I feel like a bit of an outsider at the present moment.

Also, if someone could help me out and give me a quick guide (idk if that's the right word) on basically everything I should know about avicus, since I'm lost on so so many things.
body_tagged:

title: Hi there...

replies.body:
Hey welcome!

Thanks for stepping up to the task of referring!  Just stick around, people will get to know you :D

replies.body: There is like a 10 competitive teams , theres no scrim whenever , avicus have some blocklag , theres an slack community and a skype official chat , the community here is nicer than others! (like kohi , ocn and more) , not saying the best!
